xyz.izaak.radon.gamesystem

Interface GameSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FirstPersonCameraSystem, JBulletPhysicsSystem, KeyReleaseQuitSystem

    public interface GameSystem
    A GameSystem is the fundamental framework of functionality in a Radon game. A Radon Game comprises a set of GameSystem objects whose methods it calls in response to initialization, ticks, and input events. By default, all methods are no-ops, which allows each GameSystem to only implement the specific callbacks it needs.

      default void onKeyUp(int key)
      Called once when a key is released
      default void onMouseDown(org.joml.Vector2f position, int button)
      Called once when a mouse button is pressed
      default void onMouseMove(org.joml.Vector2f delta)
      Called each time the mouse moves
      default void onMouseUp(org.joml.Vector2f position, int button)
      Called once when a mouse button is released
      default void onResize(org.joml.Vector2f newSize)
      Called when the application window is resized
      default void onScroll(float x, float y)
      Called when the mouse scroll wheel (or trackpad) is used
      default void update(float seconds)
      Called each frame

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        default void initialize()
        Called after the OpenGL context is initialized, but before the game loop begins

      • update

        default void update(float seconds)
        Called each frame
        Parameters:
        seconds - how much time in seconds has elapsed since the previous frame

      • onKeyDown

        default void onKeyDown(int key)
        Called once when a key is pressed down
        Parameters:
        key - the GLFW key code of the key which was pressed down

      • onKeyHeld

        default void onKeyHeld(int key)
        Called repeatedly while a key is held down
        Parameters:
        key - the GLFW key code of the key which is held down

      • onKeyRepeat

        default void onKeyRepeat(int key)
        Called repeatedly while a key is held down, but not the first time
        Parameters:
        key - the GLFW key code of the key which is being repeated

      • onKeyUp

        default void onKeyUp(int key)
        Called once when a key is released
        Parameters:
        key - the GLFW key code of the key which was released

      • onMouseMove

        default void onMouseMove(org.joml.Vector2f delta)
        Called each time the mouse moves
        Parameters:
        delta - the distance, in pixels, that the mouse has moved since the previous frame

      • onMouseDown

        default void onMouseDown(org.joml.Vector2f position,
                         int button)
        Called once when a mouse button is pressed
        Parameters:
        position - the location of the mouse, in pixels, from the corner of the window
        button - the GLFW mouse button code for the button which was pressed

      • onMouseUp

        default void onMouseUp(org.joml.Vector2f position,
                       int button)
        Called once when a mouse button is released
        Parameters:
        position - the location of the mouse, in pixels, from the corner of the window
        button - the GLFW mouse button code for the button which was released

      • onScroll

        default void onScroll(float x,
                      float y)
        Called when the mouse scroll wheel (or trackpad) is used
        Parameters:
        x - the vertical amount scrolled
        y - the horizontal amount scrolled

      • onResize

        default void onResize(org.joml.Vector2f newSize)
        Called when the application window is resized
        Parameters:
        newSize - the new size, in pixels, of the application window
